title: Internet Troubles-Low priority queue.
body: I have had internet troubles today, and the last two games my internet has shut down unexpectedly, I had reconnected as soon as it was back up and running, and then after the game I now have 5 low priority queues, Is there any way you can remove them please. It was not my fault and I had no intensions on leaving.{{champion:114}}

replies.body:
Unfortunately, if you leave a game, even if it was because of internet connectivity, then for all intents and purposes you are considered to have left the game. If the system wasn't like this, then what's to stop rage-quitters and purposeful leavers from leaving games by just disconnecting their computers?

Riot's policy is not to remove penalties under any circumstances. If you are experiencing connectivity problems then you are encouraged to fix them before playing any more match-made games. You can test out your connection in a custom game with no penalty for leaving.
